topic.name: Pauline
topic.title: fake news detection
topic.description: All publications and workshops concerning the detection (identification) of fake news (disinformation, misinformation or deep fakes)
topic.narrative: Relevant documents show the bigram of "fake news" or its synonyms in the context of their detection mechanisms.

topic.name: Iris
topic.title: multimedia retrieval
topic.description: Which documents have information about multimedia information retrieval.
topic.narrative: To be relevant documents have to have methods and information of multimedia retrieval.
